resources:
SysOvl Mr. White Settings SysOvl/Settings
SysOvl SysOvl SysOvl
--- Start on boot If on, the battery bar service will be started automatically. Dev. mode If set, additional developer options can be defined. Show debug text If set, the red text with additional info below the battery bar will be shown. General settings Development settings
----
LED while charging If on, the phone LED will be used to show the battery charging level while charging. Use text file for logging If set, the log messages will be sent to a text file. Log debug messages If set, debug messages will be sent to the system log. Log file name The name of the log file. Default is \"SysOvl.log\" The log file will be created in the root of the external sdcard if exist, or in the internal storage if doesn\'t.
